dialogueText: MISSION CONTROL TO NANO@ DO YOU READ ME?
GOOD. WE'VE MADE CONTACT
YOU CAN CALL ME GEN. BRYAN
I'LL BE GUIDING YOU THROUGHOUT THIS MISSION. LET'S START WITH THE BASICS.
USE WASD OR ARROW KEYS TO MOVE AROUND. SPACEBAR TO JUMP.
ONCE YOU'RE READY HEAD EAST. TIME IS NOT ON OUR SIDE@ LET'S KEEP THINGS MOVING.
YOU'RE APPROACHING A GAP@ HIT THE JUMP BUTTON.
DON'T WORRY@ YOUR MOBILITY IS STATE-OF-THE-ART.
THERE'S NO ROOM FOR MISTAKES HERE.
SEE THOSE YELLOW BLOCKS?
THOSE ARE CHARGED PLATFORMS.
YOUR ELECTRICAL FIELD WILL CONDUCT ANYTHING YOU TOUCH.
STEP ON THEM TO ACTIVATE SURROUNDING BLOCKS. GIVE IT A TRY.
NOTICE YOUR BATTERY DEPLETING?
STANDING ON CHARGED BLOCKS WILL DRAIN YOUR POWER.
DON'T WORRY THOUGH@ THERE'S SUNLIGHT AHEAD.
STEP INTO IT TO RECHARGE.
THERE IT IS—SUNLIGHT. STEP IN AND RECHARGE.
STAY IN THE LIGHT TO FULLY RESTORE YOUR BATTERY.
REMEMBER@ WITHOUT POWER@ YOU'RE DONE FOR.
CHECKPOINTS ARE INSTALLED THROUGHOUT THE FACILITY.
REACH ONE@ AND YOUR PROGRESS WILL BE SAVED.
OH@ YOU'VE MADE IT THIS FAR? IMPRESSIVE...
WE ARE JUST GETTING STARTED! HA HA HA
THIS IS MY PLAYGROUND NOW@ YOU WON'T GET PAST SO EASILY.
ONE MISTAKE@ AND YOU'LL BE NOTHING BUT SCRAP.
WHAT'S THIS? LITTLE ROBOT TRYING TO PLAY HERO?
YOU THINK YOU CAN OUTSMART ME? PATHETIC.
IGNORE HIM@ NANO. YOU'RE DOING GREAT.
STAY FOCUSED ON THE TASK. KEEP MOVING.
DATALOGS—THESE ARE CRITICAL.
RESEARCHERS WHO ONCE WORKED HERE LEFT BEHIND KEY INFORMATION.
EACH DATALOG YOU FIND WILL HELP UNLOCK THE NEXT LEVEL.
YOU'LL NEED EVERY PIECE TO MOVE FORWARD.
